title: x/tools/cmd/stringer: don't concatenate all strings
body:
stringer concatenates strings (see https://github.com/golang/tools/commit/22ede605a76fe5957178d9b6290c986ae066316d). The original motivation was to shrink the resulting binary. Thanks for work by @crawshaw and @rsc during the Go 1.7 cycle, there is no longer a penalty for having multiple smaller strings. The non-concatenated strings are more readable, so we might want to go back to multiple smaller strings.

Low priority.
